Changelog
=========

0.3 (2012-12-02)
----------------

- Re-release.



0.1dev (unreleased)
-------------------

- Sets contact-info-view as default-view for folder 'contact'

- Makes contact-info-view available for folders

- Sets 'go-to-welcome' as default-view for the portal

- Adds a static-text-portlet for the left and right column

- Adds a link 'go-to-welcome' that directs to 'welcome'

- Adds folders 'welcome', 'about' and 'contact'

- Initial release
